overview: Tahia commits the crime of embezzlement at the instigation of her neighbor, Ahmed, and gives him the money she stole, and she is sentenced to life imprisonment. He uses the money in drug dealing in cooperation with his friend Fawzi and Khalil. Tahia is released, and Ahmed marries her in a customary manner. Tahia gives birth to a child, and Ahmed refuses to attribute it to him. Police crackdowns on drug dealers are active, so they agree to kill the police officer.
title: ابن تحية عزوز
